Summary: I was in my frineds Pool lookig up and saw craft hover then speed off in TWO stages of acceleration
divs: sighting detailsi was in my friends pool at around 4pm cst in daylight. i was looking up in the sky ( almost directly overhead ) 90 degrees above horizon while floating in the pool and saw an orange \ gold object hovering in the sky.. it was the size of a head of your standard head of a pin at arms length. i stayed there fro about 10 minutes approx... but moved slightly from nw to s\ i went to my car to get my camera.. came back an saw that it moved to the s even more.. i clicked my camera and at that instant it moved to the south at two seperate speed of acceleration first from stopped postion to fats then as if it clicked into another state of acceleration to go even faster. and disappeared to the s .. acceleration from stopped to not about to be seen happened in roughly 1 second...
